name: blue-iris
description: Blue Iris is a Windows-based video security software that supports IP and webcam monitoring, motion detection, and recording with advanced alert capabilities. It is widely used for home surveillance and security systems.

features.title: Video Surveillance
features.description: Professional security camera monitoring for Windows. Complete surveillance solution

features.title: Ip Camera Support
features.description: Works with IP cameras and webcams. Universal compatibility

features.title: Recording Management
features.description: Continuous or triggered recording with storage management. Flexible options

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Email, SMS, and push notifications for events. Stay informed

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: View cameras from anywhere via web or mobile. Monitor remotely

features.title: Home Security
features.description: Widely used for residential surveillance systems. Trusted solution
